description:
Who are the Critical Role cast and their characters? These incredible actors and roleplayers shot to stardom through playing Dungeons and Dragons on camera, but you may not know them by sight. Read on for a full breakdown of every Critical Role cast member, and the character they play in each of the game's three campaigns.

Continue reading Critical Role cast and characters guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide,
title: Critical Role cast and characters guide

description:
Chasing down rare Yugioh cards is a serious business. Like many TCGs, Yugioh is no longer a simple pastime enjoyed in playgrounds, but has morphed into a serious collector’s market, spanning the globe. Since releasing in 1999, some cards have taken on such a reputation they sell for tens of thousands of dollars at auction. This guide profiles the 25 most expensive Yugioh cards ever, and how much they sold for.

The most expensive Yugioh cards are a varied bunch. They aren't necessarily simply the best Yugioh cards available; nor is this list stuffed with
title: The 25 most expensive Yugioh cards and prices

description:
Tabletop games company Wizkids is releasing a new Dungeons and Dragons themed board game, based in the game’s famous city of Baldur’s Gate. The upcoming Builders of Baldur’s Gate will see players vying for influence and control as they create new buildings in the city, all the while keeping its walls safe from monsters.

Continue reading New DnD board game has you build a Baldur’s Gate business empire
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024
title: New DnD board game has you build a Baldur’s Gate business empire

description:
Who are the main Vox Machina characters? Critical Role's very first RPG-streaming campaign, Vox Machina, kickstarted the critters' rise to fame - and it's now morphed into its own big-budget Dungeons and Dragons animated series! Legends of Vox Machina Season 3 comes out in a matter of weeks, so read on for a who's who of the main characters, their classes, and who plays them in the show.

Continue reading All the main Vox Machina characters, explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review,
title: All the main Vox Machina characters, explained

description:
A Magic: The Gathering fan has devised a 19-card infinite combo that only functions if you solve a math puzzle. The problem is, that puzzle is an unsolved mathematical hypothesis known as the Twin Prime Conjecture which has never been resolved.

Continue reading MTG fan creates mind-bending infinite combo that breaks math
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: MTG fan creates mind-bending infinite combo that breaks math

description:
The P3 range of paints for miniatures is nearing the end of a successful Kickstarter campaign, which will see it relaunched with new chemical formulas under new owner Steamforged Games. I’ve been testing early paint samples from the new range on my backlog of Warhammer 40k minis, and I’m happy to report that the new formula P3 paints are better than ever.

Continue reading Relaunched P3 model paints still kick butt for painting Warhammer 40k
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warham
title: Relaunched P3 model paints still kick butt for painting Warhammer 40k

description:
Another Magic: The Gathering Secret Lair starring virtual pop idol Hatsune Miku has been announced. The Hatsune Miku x Secret Lair Fall drop features the blue-haired singer and her pals on an array of planeswalker cards, including a Liliana and a Jace.

Continue reading MTG’s new Hatsune Miku cards cast her as five different planeswalkers
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: MTG’s new Hatsune Miku cards cast her as five different planeswalkers

description:
Games Workshop has revealed a new competition with an incredible prize: five lucky winners will receive every single new Warhammer 40k Kill Team product released from mid October until the end of December 2025. To be in with a chance of winning, you will need to play a special Kill Team mission before October 14 … Continued
